metadata.Title: CVE-2016-6872 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
Integer overflow in StringUtil::implode in Facebook HHVM before 3.15.0allows attackers to have unspecified impact via unknown vectors.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-6872` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

hhvm - 3.12.11+dfsg-1build1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: hhvm package in esm-apps/bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.12.11+dfsg-1build1').
